decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.  Reason for condition: To comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - No demolition or construction work in pursuance of this permission shall be carried on before 0800 hours or after 1800 hours on Mondays to Fridays inclusive, before 0800 hours or after 1300 hours on Saturdays, and at no time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.  Reason for condition: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of adjoining residential properties.

Condition : 3 - Details of the materials to be used for the external surfaces of the building/extension shall be submitted to and approved by the local Planning Authority before any work is commenced.  Reason for condition: To ensure a satisfactory appearance for the development.

Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning General Development Order 1988 (or any Order revoking or re-enacting this Order) no windows or other openings shall be formed in the east elevation of the extensions without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for condition: To protect the privacy and amenities of the occupiers of adjoining residential properties.

Condition : 5 - Where paved surfaces pass beneath tree canopies, all excavation work shall be carried out by hand digging and porous filling shall be provided around the base of the tree or any such precautions as may be required by the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for condition: To preserve and maintain the visual amenities and character of the locality.
Condition : 6 - INFORMATIVE:  No works should be carried out to the trees on neighbouring property 4A Drax Avenue without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: ERECTION OF PITCHED ROOF OVER EXISTING GARAGE AND ERECTION OF SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSIONS,INVOLVING DEMOLITION WORKS.
